cards.name: The Power of Wealth
cards.text: When you announce The Power of Wealth as your agenda, name 1 faction. You may include cards from that faction in your draw deck and plot deck. Reduce the cost of the first in-faction card you marshal or play each round by 1. Draft format only.

cards.name: Protectors of the Realm
cards.text: You may include Knight and Army characters from any faction in your deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a Knight or Army character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown. Draft format only.

cards.name: Treaty
cards.text: When you announce Treaty as your agenda, name 2 factions. You may include cards from those factions in your draw deck and plot deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to draw 1 card. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand. Draft format only.

cards.name: Uniting the Seven Kingdoms
cards.text: You may include cards from any faction in your draw deck. Increase the cost of each out-of-faction card you marshal or play by 1. Draft format only.

cards.name: House Bannerman
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel House Bannerman to reduce the cost of the next in-faction character you marshal this phase by 1. Draft format only.

cards.name: Feast or Famine
cards.text: When Revealed: You may increase the gold value on Feast or Famine by 5. If you do, reduce the claim value on Feast of Famine by 2. Draft format only.

cards.name: Summoned by the Conclave
cards.text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an in-faction card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. Draft format only.

cards.name: The Pale Mare
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses any number of characters he or she controls with total printed cost 10 or lower. Kill each character not chosen (cannot be saved). Draft format only.

cards.name: Compelled by the King
cards.text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, choose and stand a character you control. If you win dominance this phase, that character gains 1 power. Draft format only.

cards.name: Support of Saltcliffe
cards.text: [greyjoy] character only. Attached character gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, stand attached character. Draft format only.

cards.name: Tyrion Lannister
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge or a challenge in which Tyrion Lannister is participating, pay 1 gold to draw 1 card. Draft format only.

cards.name: The Viper's Rage
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge by 5 or more STR as the defending player, each character controlled by the attacking player loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon until the end of the phase. Draft format only.

cards.name: The Nightfort
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel The Nightfort to choose a defending [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each attacking character. Draft format only.

cards.name: Raventree Elite
cards.text: No attachments. Stealth. Each House Tully you control gains "immune to opponents' triggered effects" while it is participating in a challenge. Draft format only.

cards.name: Deadly Khalasar
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose an attacking [targaryen] character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each Dothraki character you control and gains intimidate. Draft format only.

cards.name: Blackcrown Knights
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which Blackcrown Knights is participating, discard 1 card from your hand to have Blackcrown Knights gain 2 power. Draft format only.

cards.name: Lyn Corbray
cards.text: Stealth. Each non-Army character you control with printed cost 6 or higher gets +2 STR. Draft format only.

cards.name: Hollow Hill
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal a character with a faction affiliation that does not match any other card you control, draw 1 card. Draft format only.

cards.name: Muster
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a Knight character to search your deck for a Knight character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. Draft format only.

cards.name: Holding the Trident
cards.text: While you control fewer characters than each opponent, each character you control gets +2 STR. Draft format only.

cards.name: Common Cause
cards.text: X is the number of different faction affiliations among characters you control. Draft format only.
